comment: Smart Data Models - GovSteamFV3 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovSteamFV3/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified GovSteamIEEE1 Steam turbine governor model with Prmax limit and fast valving.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: k
contents.comment: Governor gain, (reciprocal of droop) (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Fraction of turbine power developed after first boiler pass (K1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Fraction of turbine power developed after second boiler pass (K2).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k3
contents.comment: Fraction of hp turbine power developed after crossover or third boiler pass (K3). Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmax
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening, PU of MWbase (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmin
contents.comment: Minimum valve opening, PU of MWbase (Pmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: prmax
contents.comment: Max. pressure in reheater (Prmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Governor lead time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Governor lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Valve positioner time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Inlet piping/steam bowl time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Time constant of second boiler pass (i.e. reheater) (T5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Time constant of crossover or third boiler pass (T6).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Time to close intercept valve (IV) (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.97. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Time until IV starts to reopen (Tb).  Typical Value = 0.98. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Time until IV is fully open (Tc).  Typical Value = 0.99. Default: 0

contents.name: uc
contents.comment: Maximum valve closing velocity (Uc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uo
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening velocity (Uo).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
